#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int p[100001];


int find( int b)
{
	int n1 = b;
	while ( p[b] != b) {
		b = p[b];
	}
	while ( n1 != b) {

	  int n12 = p[n1];
	  p[n1] = b;
	  n1 = n12;
	}

	return b;
}







int main()
{
	int t;
cin>>t;

	while ( t-- ) {
		int n,m,a,b,q;
cin>>n>>m;

		for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++)
			p[i] = i;



		for ( int i = 0; i < m;i++) {

			cin>>a>>b;
			int r = find(a);
			int r2 = find(b);
			p[r2] = r;

		}
		int count = 0;
		for ( int i = 0; i < n;i++) {
			if ( p[i] == i)
			  count++;

		}
		printf("%d\n",count);
	}
	return 0;
}
